item.title: first post
item.description: you write text here this how you use an image. the sides can be either left, right and center and it will be resized based on the user’s screen size. (original) and here more text 🗒️ alerts can be info ⚠️ alerts can be warning ❗ alerts can be danger ✅ alerts can be success
